critique: The document is a formal announcement of the approval of provisions for the Retail Food and Grocery Trade. The language is formal and legalistic, and the tone is authoritative and decisive. There is no indication of joy, sadness, anger, fear, disgust, or surprise. The president is conveying a sense of confidence and determination in implementing the National Industrial Recovery Act. Considering that there isn't enough information, a score of 1 will be given to all the emotions.
